abstract: Petrovietnam said it still had the option to buy the offshore oil projects that BP agreed to sell to its Russian joint venture TNK-BP, Reuters reported.
snippet: Petrovietnam said it still had the option to buy the offshore oil projects that BP agreed to sell to its Russian joint venture TNK-BP, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: The Vietnamese state oil group Petrovietnam said on Friday it still had the option to buy the offshore oil projects BP agreed this week to sell to its Russian joint venture TNK-BP, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Petrovietnam Could Still Buy BP Assets
